issue.title: Python: Add function to convert NumPy/Pandas dtypes to Arrow DataTypes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1126](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1126). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We already provide a method to convert Arrow DataTypes to Pandas/NumPy. The reverse is yet missing.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1126?focusedCommentId=16055309) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
